title: Switch to code-specific embedding model (jina-embeddings-v2-base-code)
description:
**Goal**: Replace the general-purpose embedding model (all-MiniLM-L6-v2) with a code-specialized model to improve semantic search quality for code.

**What we're accomplishing**: The jina-embeddings-v2-base-code model is specifically trained on 150M+ code Q&A pairs and supports 30+ programming languages. It offers:
- Better semantic understanding of code vs natural language
- 8K token context window (vs 512) for larger code chunks
- Improved accuracy for code search queries

**Impact**: Higher quality search results, better symbol matching, improved cross-repo dependency detection.

**Implementation**:
- Update DEFAULT_MODEL in embeddings.py
- Test with existing indexed repos
- Document model selection rationale
- Add configuration option for model choice

title: Test jina-embeddings model with existing repos
